record.description: Plan to launch the cancer drive. "Cancer is a women's problem" is the title of the leaflet studied by Women's Board members of the University of Chicago Cancer Research Foundation who are planning to launch their drive next Tuesday. Seated, left to right): Mrs. Donald F. McPherson, Mrs. Frank Hibbard, Mrs. Walter B. Wolf (chair), and Mrs. Howard Fenton. Standing: Mrs. Laurence Davis, Mrs. H. Kirke Becker, and Mrs. Jack Gordon.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
